page.title: 07Another Day
page.content: It was 8'0 clock and the alarm awoke the sleepy 10 year old. Throwing aside his continental quilt he hurried to the bathroom to wash and changed into his school uniform. Breakfast of rice krispies,tea toast was already on the kitchen table. After grabbing his Rucanor schoolbag he dashed down the street to meet his pals at the traffic lights. They entered the yard as the school bell rang.The morning of maths and English flew in and the lunch bell rang at half past twelve. Now home for a snack of beans on toast, glass of lemonade and a chocolate biscuit and then its back to school till half past three.His evening's entertainment is made up of television viewing, cruising around on his B.M.X bike and playing five-a-side football. Then its off to bed before 10 pm.
